author: mirichmo
body: On Nano Server TP5, a bug in inbox PowerShell Core interferes with the script to register the new WinRM endpoint. This documents it as a known issue and provides a workaround.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Mike, minor grammatical issues.  I think we can merge.  Please fix these issues in a separate PR.

title: Adding remoting endpoint creation issue on Nano Server to list of known issues
